lyrics.ChnStr: 我一路看過千山和萬水
lyrics.EngStr: I have seen countless mountains and rivers along the way

lyrics.ChnStr: 我的腳踏遍天南和地北
lyrics.EngStr: My footsteps have traveled north and south
Whether under the sun or through the wind
The rose by the roadside

lyrics.ChnStr: 關掉了手機管他誰是誰
lyrics.EngStr: Turn off the phone, let go of who's who

lyrics.ChnStr: 不要去理會是是與非非
lyrics.EngStr: Don't bother with right or wrong
Walking from dawn to dusk
The fortress in the twilight
If you fly with the wind
Look down and see how beautiful the world is
Let all worries fade away
Don't rely on self-consolation
If there's still a dream, then chase it
At least there'll be no regrets or remorse
Chase bravely toward the light

lyrics.ChnStr: 遠走高飛 說走就走一回
lyrics.EngStr: Travel far and soar high, just go when you feel like it

lyrics.ChnStr: 翻過了山坡又踏過了水
lyrics.EngStr: Crossed over hills and waded through waters

lyrics.ChnStr: 跟心走別管東南和西北
lyrics.EngStr: Follow your heart, no matter east, south, west, or north
Move forward or step back
The afterglow beneath the setting sun

lyrics.ChnStr: 擁擠的城市佈滿了虛偽
lyrics.EngStr: The crowded city is full of pretense

lyrics.ChnStr: 何必去辯解誰錯或是對
lyrics.EngStr: Why bother debating who's wrong or right
Let everything return to simplicity
To that feeling of freedom
If you fly with the wind
Look down and see how beautiful the world is
Let all worries fade away
Don't rely on self-consolation
If there's still a dream, then chase it
At least there'll be no regrets or remorse
Chase bravely toward the light

lyrics.ChnStr: 遠走高飛 說走就走一回
lyrics.EngStr: Travel far and soar high, just go when you feel like it
If you fly with the wind
Look down and see how beautiful the world is
Let all worries fade away
Don't rely on self-consolation
If there's still a dream, then chase it
At least there'll be no regrets or remorse
Chase bravely toward the light

lyrics.ChnStr: 遠走高飛 說走就走一回
lyrics.EngStr: Travel far and soar high, just go when you feel like it
Chase bravely toward the light

lyrics.EngStr: Travel far and soar high, just go when you feel like it
